meanings.definition: A type of sailing ship with three masts.
meanings.sent1: The barkentines sailed gracefully across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy exploring old barkentines at the maritime museum.
meanings.sent3: The pirates decided to have a race using the barkentines for fun.
meanings.sent4: The barkentines glided through the waves like elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the majestic barkentines left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.sent1: We saw two barkentines docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The captain proudly displayed the collection of barkentines in the port.
meanings.sent3: The sailors joked about the abundance of barkentines in the fleet.
meanings.sent4: The harbor was filled with colorful barkentines, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The market sold miniature models of barkentines for enthusiasts to collect.
